hero.title: Leave a message for when it truly matters.
hero.subtitle: VoiceForLater lets you leave text, audio, or video messages that will be delivered in the future, or when you are no longer here.

emotional.title: Your presence, at the right moment.
items: Your voice and image, even when you can no longer be there.

uses.title: Moments worth saying
uses.subtitle: Not all messages are for now. Some need time, context, or distance.

items.title: So your words remain
items.description: A memory, a story, or advice you want to keep.

step1.title: Create your message
step1.description: Write a text, record your voice, or film a video.

step2.title: You choose the moment
step2.description: Decide when and to whom your message will arrive. We handle the rest.

step3.title: When the time comes
step3.description: Your messages will be sent to those you chose, exactly as you decided.

date.title: On a specific date
date.description: Birthdays, anniversaries, or any moment you choose.

checkin.title: When you are no longer present
checkin.description: When you are gone, we follow your instructions. Your messages arrive at the moments and to the people you chose, respecting your will and your time.

audio.title: Your voice and image
audio.description: Sometimes words aren't enough. Record audio or video messages so your loved ones can see and hear you.

trust.title: Private. Secure. Respectful.
trust.reassurance: Your messages are encrypted and only released when you decide.
trust.item2: Only delivered when conditions are met.
trust.item3: You stay in control at all times.

notWhat.title: What VoiceForLater is NOT
items: Not a replacement for a person
notWhat.clarification: VoiceForLater only delivers messages you left, exactly as you recorded them.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.justification: Less than a coffee a month, for peace of mind.
